snippet.title: Mario's New Adventure [NSMBFMD Trailer]
snippet.description:
Mario's New Adventure (short MNA) is a new New Super Mario Bros. Wii mod featuring 8 worlds with over 70 new levels to explore and many secrets to find. MNA aims to give its players a Nintendo-like experience. As of now a release date is uncertain.

If you want to stay up to date with this mod, you can subscribe to this channel to not miss out on any new development videos.
A demo for the first world of this mod is already available on:
https://drive.google.com/u/0/uc?id=1Dr7A0U3EKgCprH29eSj3zMBBToWxqLQB&export=download
MNA also has its own website which can be found here: https://b1gaming.github.io/mna/
The music used during this trailer is an abridged version of Skaven252's 3864 Jumps: https://soundcloud.com/skaven252/3864-jumps

Special thanks to @Rimea for featuring me in his NSMB Franchise Modding Direct which can be found here: https://youtu.be/dvAH9bEEuPk
